infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app uses speech recognition to convert your voice to text for creating tasks and notes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to record audio for voice commands and notes.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app accesses your camera to take photos for your tasks and notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photos to let you attach them to your tasks.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs to save photos to your library.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to take photos.
